languages.text: Vigilant's description for character generation screen

traits.locale_text: Vigilant's description for character generation screen

languages.text: Каждой цели — свой патрон. Отряд, в котором вы когда-то служили, занимался зачисткой непокорных Лекс Империалис еретиков. Там вы научились использовать разнообразные боеприпасы, наиболее подходящие к ситуации и противнику. Грамотно подбирая снаряды и выцеливая лидеров сопротивления, вы всегда достигали поставленных целей во имя Бога-Императора.

For every target, there is a bullet. Your former squad was responsible for eradicating heretics who had defied the Lex Imperialis. You learned to utilise different ammo types to best suit a given situation or take down a specific enemy. By choosing your arsenal wisely and targeting the leaders of the resistance, you always completed your objective in the God-Emperor's name.
languages.original_text: Каждой цели — свой патрон. Отряд, в котором вы когда-то служили, занимался зачисткой непокорных Лекс Империалис еретиков. Там вы научились использовать разнообразные боеприпасы, наиболее подходящие к ситуации и противнику. Грамотно подбирая снаряды и выцеливая лидеров сопротивления, вы всегда достигали поставленных целей во имя Бога-Императора.

traits.locale_text: For every target, there is a bullet. Your former squad was responsible for eradicating heretics who had defied the Lex Imperialis. You learned to utilise different types of ammo best suited for a given situation or against a specific enemy. By choosing your arsenal wisely and targeting the leaders of the resistance, you would always complete your objective in the God-Emperor's name.

By choosing your arsenal wisely and targeting the leaders of the resistance, you would always complete your objective in the God-Emperor's name.

You learned to utilise different ammo types to best suit a given situation or take down a specific enemy. languages.text: すべての標的には、それに相応しい弾丸がある。かつてのあなたの部隊は、レックス・インペリアに背いた異端者たちの粛清を任務としていた。あなたは状況や敵に応じて、最適な弾薬を使い分ける術を身につけていた。武器を賢く選び、抵抗勢力の指導者を的確に狙うことで、常に神帝陛下の御名のもと、任務を遂行してきたのだ。
languages.original_text: For every target, there is a bullet. Your former squad was responsible for eradicating heretics who had defied the Lex Imperialis. You learned to utilise different ammo types to best suit a given situation or take down a specific enemy. By choosing your arsenal wisely and targeting the leaders of the resistance, you always completed your objective in the God-Emperor's name.

traits.locale_text: すべての標的には、それに相応しい弾丸がある。かつてのあなたの部隊は、レックス・インペリアに背いた異端者たちの粛清を任務としていた。あなたは状況や敵に応じて、最適な弾薬を使い分ける術を身につけていた。武器を賢く選び、抵抗勢力の指導者を的確に狙うことで、常に神帝陛下の御名のもと、任務を遂行してきたのだ。

languages.text: Für jedes Ziel gibt es eine Kugel. Dein ehemaliger Trupp hatte die Aufgabe, Ketzer auszulöschen, die gegen das Lex Imperia verstoßen hatten. Du hast gelernt, je nach Situation oder Gegner unterschiedliche Munitionstypen einzusetzen,. Durch die kluge Wahl deines Arsenals und die Eliminierung der Rädelsführer hast du stets dein Ziel erreicht, immer im Namen des Gottimperators.
languages.original_text: For every target, there is a bullet. Your former squad was responsible for eradicating heretics who had defied the Lex Imperialis. You learned to utilise different ammo types to best suit a given situation or take down a specific enemy. By choosing your arsenal wisely and targeting the leaders of the resistance, you always completed your objective in the God-Emperor's name.

traits.locale_text: Für jedes Ziel gibt es eine Kugel. Dein ehemaliger Trupp hatte die Aufgabe, Ketzer auszulöschen, die gegen das Lex Imperia verstoßen hatten. Du hast gelernt, je nach Situation oder Gegner unterschiedliche Munitionstypen einzusetzen,. Durch die kluge Wahl deines Arsenals und die Eliminierung der Rädelsführer hast du stets dein Ziel erreicht, immer im Namen des Gottimperators.

languages.text: À chaque cible est destinée une balle. Votre ancienne escouade avait pour mission d'éradiquer les hérétiques qui avaient osé défier la Lex Imperialis. Vous avez appris à utiliser différents types de munitions pour vous adapter à toutes les situations ou pour abattre des ennemis spécifiques. En choisissant votre arsenal judicieusement et en visant les meneurs de la résistance, vous avez toujours réussi à accomplir vos objectifs au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu.
languages.original_text: For every target, there is a bullet. Your former squad was responsible for eradicating heretics who had defied the Lex Imperialis. You learned to utilise different ammo types to best suit a given situation or take down a specific enemy. By choosing your arsenal wisely and targeting the leaders of the resistance, you always completed your objective in the God-Emperor's name.

traits.locale_text: À chaque cible est destinée une balle. Votre ancienne escouade avait pour mission d'éradiquer les hérétiques qui avaient osé défier la Lex Imperialis. Vous avez appris à utiliser différents types de munitions pour vous adapter à toutes les situations ou pour abattre des ennemis spécifiques. En choisissant votre arsenal judicieusement et en visant les meneurs de la résistance, vous avez toujours réussi à accomplir vos objectifs au nom de l'Empereur-Dieu.

languages.text: Hay una bala para cada objetivo. Tu antigua escuadra tenía el cometido de erradicar a los herejes que desafiaban la Lex Imperialis. Aprendiste a usar distintos tipos de munición para adaptarte a las circunstancias o neutralizar enemigos específicos. Escogiendo sabiamente tu arsenal y eliminando a los líderes de la resistencia, siempre cumplías tu misión en nombre del Dios Emperador.
languages.original_text: For every target, there is a bullet. Your former squad was responsible for eradicating heretics who had defied the Lex Imperialis. You learned to utilise different ammo types to best suit a given situation or take down a specific enemy. By choosing your arsenal wisely and targeting the leaders of the resistance, you always completed your objective in the God-Emperor's name.

traits.locale_text: Hay una bala para cada objetivo. Tu antigua escuadra tenía el cometido de erradicar a los herejes que desafiaban la Lex Imperialis. Aprendiste a usar distintos tipos de munición para adaptarte a las circunstancias o neutralizar enemigos específicos. Escogiendo sabiamente tu arsenal y eliminando a los líderes de la resistencia, siempre cumplías tu misión en nombre del Dios Emperador.

languages.text: 每颗子弹都精准对应受审之人的罪行。你之前的作战小队专职清剿那些忤逆帝国律法的异端分子，而你擅长针对不同战场态势灵活选用特种弹药，消灭各自不同的敌人。你总能以神皇赐予的智慧选择最恰当的作战方式，让每个罪恶之徒的覆灭都成为彰显帝国威严的完美注脚。
languages.original_text: For every target, there is a bullet. Your former squad was responsible for eradicating heretics who had defied the Lex Imperialis. You learned to utilise different ammo types to best suit a given situation or take down a specific enemy. By choosing your arsenal wisely and targeting the leaders of the resistance, you always completed your objective in the God-Emperor's name.

traits.locale_text: 每颗子弹都精准对应受审之人的罪行。你之前的作战小队专职清剿那些忤逆帝国律法的异端分子，而你擅长针对不同战场态势灵活选用特种弹药，消灭各自不同的敌人。你总能以神皇赐予的智慧选择最恰当的作战方式，让每个罪恶之徒的覆灭都成为彰显帝国威严的完美注脚。

languages.text: Her hedef için bir mermi vardır. Eski mangan, Lex İmperialis'e karşı gelen kâfirlerin kökünü kazımaktan mesuldü. Farklı koşullar altında veya belirli bir düşmanı yere indirmek için hangi cephane türünden yararlanacağını iyi öğrendin. Silahlarını akıllıca seçip direnişin önderlerini hedef alarak, Tanrı İmparator adına üstlendiğin bu vazifelerin hepsini başarıyla yerine getirdin.
languages.original_text: For every target, there is a bullet. Your former squad was responsible for eradicating heretics who had defied the Lex Imperialis. You learned to utilise different ammo types to best suit a given situation or take down a specific enemy. By choosing your arsenal wisely and targeting the leaders of the resistance, you always completed your objective in the God-Emperor's name.
